name: Budding
description:
Budding is a game where you play as a plant bud, exploring the world around you and growing as you do. Each time you grow to your full flowery state, you spread seeds and then (eventually, as future versions come out) continue to play the game as one of your descendants. The goal of the game is to just survive and ‘bud’ for as long as you can while avoiding enemies and making sure you grow to the best of your ability. 

This is a laid back game I've made for my HND Digital Design course, entirely made for fun and to show what I've learned and how I'm still learning in my time here at college.
